lead_paragraph: The case of Mr. Regeni, who was tortured and killed, has Western officials debating how to address the worsening human rights situation in Egypt.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

snippet: The case of Mr. Regeni, who was tortured and killed, has Western officials debating how to address the worsening human rights situation in Egypt....

byline.contributor: Mark Mazzetti contributed reporting from Washington, Gaia Pianigiani from Rome, and Nour Youssef from Cairo.

headline.print_headline: Killing of Italian, Amid Rising Repression, Puts Focus on Egypt’s Stability
headline.main: Killing of Italian Student, Giulio Regeni, Puts Focus on Egypt’s Stability

abstract: Death and apparent torture of Italian student Giulio Regeni in Egypt has caused some to speculate that government security forces are to blame; case has touched off concerns over human rights abuses and political repression under weak government of Pres Abdel Fattah el-Sisi.
